alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 06 at 9:55AM CST until February 07 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma affecting Leake County. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CST Monday the stage was 19.0 feet. - Forecast...The river has crested and is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Yockanookany River Ofahoma 19.0 19.0 Mon 8 am CST 18.5 17.7 16.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 8 PM CST.
